rows.label: qst702605_msg0001
rows.name: Huh? A job request for me?

rows.label: qst702605_msg0002
rows.name:
You want me to get the great
gold-collecting machine working?

rows.label: qst702605_msg0003
rows.name:
I can try, but I'm only
really interested in bugs...

rows.label: qst702605_msg0004
rows.name: If that's okay with you, I'll take it.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0008
rows.name: Done! The Golden Scorpion is complete!

rows.label: qst702605_msg0009
rows.name:
I customized it to my liking
and renamed it, but...

rows.label: qst702605_msg0011
rows.name:
Here, go try it out in
the Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm busy too, so I think you
should ask someone more skilled.

rows.label: qst702605_msg0102
rows.name:
If you haven't tried it yet, go
try it out in the Dannagh Desert.
